metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2054 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
PHPExcel before 1.8.0, as used in ownCloud Server before 5.0.15 and 6.0.xbefore 6.0.2, does not disable external entity loading in libxml, whichallows remote attackers to read arbitrary files, cause a denial of service,or possibly have other impact via an XML External Entity (XXE) attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dolibarr - 3.5.3+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.3+dfsg1-1').
moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-3').
